author: Lesley Waters
method: For the fondue, in a bain-marie over a low heat melt the chocolate and butter together.  Add the brandy. Stir through the cream, honey and cocoa powder. Place into a serving dish.  For the kebabs, thread the pears and raspberries onto the skewers, alternating one another. Place the kebabs around the bowl of chocolate fondue and serve.
ingredients: 25g/1oz dark chocolate,  25g/1oz butter,  25ml/1fl oz brandy ,  50g/1¾oz cocoa powder,  120ml/4 &frac14fl oz; double cream ,  3 tbsp honey,  2 pears, cut into cubes ,  100g/3½oz raspberries
